situation.title: Infected member of the household
situation.meta_description: Recommendations for a household with COVID-19 positive member

content.processed:
Recommendations

If possible, designate a separate room for an infected member of the household. If you cannot designate a separate room, then it is important the beds in the room are at least one meter apart and the place is regularly ventilated.

The infected person must follow isolation rules, you must quarantine.

To minimise the risk of transmitting the infection to other members of the household, the infected person is advised to move around the common areas of the house in a face mask. The infected person should always go to the bathroom as the last one and should use his/her own towel. Â
